title: Victoria Beckham shares stunning video of family in Breast Cancer Awareness post
text:

Victoria Beckham took a cute video of her family for Breast Cancer Awareness month as they each posed wearing a pink breast cancer badge.

The star, 45, put together a short video of snaps of the Beckhams as she promoted the cause to her 27.1million Instagram followers on Monday.

In the clip, it flips between Victoria herself, followed by Cruz, 14, husband David, 44, daughter Harper, 8, Romeo, 17 and Brooklyn, 20 - and they're each wearing a badge to promote awareness of breast cancer.

"Stronger together in the fight against cancer. X #BreastCancerAwarenessMonth," Victoria wrote to her fans.

They praised the former Spice Girl for sharing the video and left love hearts and praying hand emojis on the post.

(Image: Twitter)

It comes as she divulged all the secrets to why her 20-year marriage to David is a great success.

In a new TV interview with TODAY on Tuesday, Posh Spice spilled the beans on why she and her husband of 20 years are "lucky to have found each other".

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: Twitter)

The mother stressed everything she and David do revolves around their four children Brooklyn, Romeo, Cruz and Harper as they have made them number one priority.

Also, the former pop star gushed how they have "grown" together as individuals while they go through life by each other's sides.

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: Twitter)

Although Victoria commented it was love at first sight for the pair, their relationship has stood the test of time.

(Image: Twitter)

She said: "The kids are our priority. Everything we do revolves around the kids. We both work really hard, we love what we do professionally. We appreciate each other. We are very lucky to have found each other and we are growing together.

"It was love at first sight. It was love at first sight."
description: The former Spice Girl shared a small clip of her family promoting Breast Cancer Awareness
